definition: the small unused part of something (especially the end of a cigarette that is left after smoking), strike one's toe accidentally against an object
details:
noun
- the small unused part of something (especially the end of a cigarette that is left after smoking)
= synonyms: butt
- the part of a check that is retained as a record
= synonyms: check stub, counterfoil
- a torn part of a ticket returned to the holder as a receipt
= synonyms: ticket stub
- a small piece
= synonyms: nub
- a short piece remaining on a trunk or stem where a branch is lost
verb
- strike one's toe accidentally against an object
= example: strike one's toe accidentally against an object
- clear of weeds by uprooting them
= example: clear of weeds by uprooting them
- extinguish by crushing
= example: extinguish by crushing
= synonyms: extinguish, stub out, crush out, press out
- pull up (weeds) by their roots
